overview: Good models aren't born, they're trained, and working with Bel Ami means they're trained by the best. Bel Ami's Personal Trainers Dano Sulik and Sebastian Bonnet teach raw young recruits how to give and take it like men. Spontaneous and unrehearsed, the cinema vrit filming captures every second of the combustive action in the non-stop sex-a-thons. The eight Personal Trainers videos are exactly what an early review predicted: One of the great series of all time.
title: Personal Trainers 8
